About me

A long time gamer, tech enthusiast, and friend. I work with integrity and honesty. Asking the right questions is my greatest skill to get to desired solutions. Always willing to improve myself and help others.

View Resume

Projects

Face Detection Website

I enjoyed building project this to showcase the complete package of typical Full Stack Developer skills. React based website featuring a functional user registration system. User registration acheived through a Node server and a PostgreSQL database. Register and login to use a face detection API by providing the URL of an image.

See Live Website GitHub Server GitHub

Network Tool

A personal project to make network troubleshooting commands easily accessible in a UI for Windows. Built in Visual Studio Blend with C# and WPF. Useful experience in making a reliable tool with a clean UI; once I figured out how to pull data from the Network Interface Controller!

GitHub

Gaming Team Website

A trip back in time to when I developed and administered a website for the gaming team I led. With a 4 decade age range on the roster, and multiple cultures, I had the pleasure of organizing our talented team. My first foray into building a homepage with an embedded custom Adobe Flash Player, and a phpBB3 forum board to boot!

Sorry, this lost relic has no hyperlinks!

Cat Friends Website

My first project in React. Makes an API call for a list of users on first mount, and another API draws them as cats. Primary challenge was to make a quick and responsive design. The cute cats are a bonus.

EXTRA

Copy the following URL into your browser, and modify "CHANGE" to whatever you want to generate your own cat:

https://robohash.org/CHANGE.png?set=set4

See Live GitHub

Gradient Picker Website

HTML, CSS, and Javascript coming together to show off some raw DOM manipulation. Try finding your favorite color mixture! Built as an exercise during my Full Stack Web Development course taken from Zero To Mastery.

See Live GitHub
